column1: Yanta District (simplified Chinese: 雁塔区; traditional Chinese: 雁塔區; pinyin: Yàntǎ Qū) is one of 11 urban districts of the prefecture-level city of Xi'an
column3: Northwest China. The district borders the districts of Weiyang to the north
column5: Beilin and Xincheng to the northeast
